segments.text: What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like to buy two exquisite watches for me and my girlfriend .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have many pairs for couples . Look at this counter .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You have a very good taste , this pair is the latest product .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What function does this watch have ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Both of them are luminous with a time reminder function . They don't need battery , because they can absorb energy from the sun .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In addition , they are waterproof and shockproof .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We guarantee the quality of the product for 12 months . We also provide a worldwide warranty .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much does the pair cost ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is a bit expensive . But it is worth buying one's favorite . I will take them .
segments.speaker: S2
